{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Firebox T40 Front.png |image1_size = 300px |caption = Watchguard Firebox T40-CW |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox T40 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -CW |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = BS4AE5 |page_start_date = 16 July 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WatchGuard_Firebox_T40-CW_(BS4AE5) |wlclass = AC2100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-BS4AE5CW |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A214400X |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = NXP;LS1043A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SSD |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Innotek;DEM24-16GM41BW1SC; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U3235FM2I-10G; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD1024M8A3-HR; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1545; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:01:21 |oui = 00:01:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.09; |stockos = Linux;4.14.83;WatchGuard Fireware OS version 12.7.1.B656839;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, mSATA (M.2) (SSD), SIM |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 54 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = DIN (3-pin)
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LTE Cat.6, RTC w/ battery, SIM Card slot, TPM, heatsink |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;1;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;2;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, 200V, 34A N-Channel Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFH5020PbF;;1;,,, 3.8-17V, 12A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS56C215;;1;,,, 4.5-17V, 8A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS658215;;1;,,, Positive High-Voltage Power-Limiting Hotswap Controller;TI;TPS2493;;1;,,, 8-bit Parallel-Out Serial Shift Register;TI;SN74LV164A;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |defaultssid = T40-CW-XX:XX:XX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/01/2021 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Senao PCE5503AN |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/help-center/en-US/Content/en-US/Hardware-Guides/firebox-t40-hardware-guide.html Hardware Guide] * [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/Firebox_T40_quickstartguide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
{{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' LS1043A @1.0GHz :Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 4GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Storage: 4MB (SPI) Flash, 16GB (mSATA M.2) SSD *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 (802.11bgn), :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 (802.11an/ac) :[[Senao]] Mini PCIe Module, PCB ID: 7016A186400 *Cellular: ''Cinterion'' PLAS9-W :Multi Band LTE Cat. 6 *Network: 5x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 54V/1.2A via 3-pin DIN
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:WatchGuard Firebox T40-CW External.jpeg|External View File:WatchGuard Firebox T40-CW Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox T10-CW Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:WatchGuard Firebox T10-CW Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
